Sentencas: The technological feasibility of electrophoretic deposition (EPD) of gadolinium doped ceria (GDC) on polypyrrole (PPy) coated yttrium stabilized zirconia (YSZ) has been reported.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: To enhance the EPD technique for the fabrication of GDC layer and to deepen the understanding of EPD, the fundamental characteristics of EPD of GDC on PPy coated YSZ were investigated.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The deposition rate of GDC on PPy coated YSZ is slower than that on graphite under the same voltage.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: An H+ ion accumulation zone is formed in the vicinity of PPy coated YSZ after applying the voltage.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The thickness of this ion accumulation zone initially increases and then decreases.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Finally, the ion accumulation zone is replaced by an ion depletion zone.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The absorbed H+ ions are desorbed from the particles after deposition and are then reduced to hydrogen gas.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The reduction of absorbed H+ ions and free H+ ions corresponds to the deposition and the unavoidable side reaction, respectively.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: A new parameter, f, the percentage of electric charged associated with the reduction of absorbed H+ ions in the total charge, is introduced to reflect the competitive relationship between the deposition and the inevitable side reaction.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: f decreases with the increase of current density.
Titulo: A study on the electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria on polypyrrole coated yttrium stabilized zirconia
